title: FORSAKEN JAYCE BUG?!?!
body:
Okay, so i bought the Forsaken Jayce skin a little while ago and although i have had it for sometime, i dont use it all the much and between the times that i dont use it to when i do - i always forget one thing.

When changing stances - Melee to Ranged, my FPS drops to 01 and i cannot see a thing - every single time the Stance changes it lags out completely...

PLEASE RAISE YOUR HAND IF ANYONE IS EXPERIENCING THIS ALSO? it is only this skin that i have seen it happen on and would just like a simple resolve - give me my RP back. i dont regret buying the skin, i would just like it to work again. {{champion:126}} {{item:3157}} 

Anyone else out there?

replies.body: HMMMM, strange never happened on the Debonair skin...
it happens with all his skins as far as im concerned
